dict.acceptation: 聪明的；敏捷的；漂亮的；整齐的；
引起…的疼痛（或痛苦、苦恼等）；
聪明伶俐地，轻快地，漂亮地；

sent.orig: So it be smart when you're parroting smart people.
sent.trans: 所以你要跟聪明人学舌就不费吹灰之力显得聪明。

sent.orig: Fool thinks smart, smart people know they are stupid.
sent.trans: 笨蛋自以为聪明，聪明人才知道自己是笨蛋。

sent.orig: Now you're smart and a smart fellow doesn't do something he knows he'll suffer for.
sent.trans: 你是明白人，明白人不吃眼前亏。

sent.orig: We all want to be smart about what we believe, so be smart about advertisements!
sent.trans: 我们都不轻易相信任何东西，因此也应该小心提防商业广告中的陷阱。

sent.orig: Smart shooters don't shoot from the hip. Smart bosses don't shoot from the lip.
sent.trans: 聪明的射手不鲁莽开枪。聪明的老板不出口伤人。
